name: FATE (itch)
description:
Fate is a sci-fi first person shooter with fast-paced action and extraordinary voxel aesthetic. Avenge your family with a machine railgun and destroy hordes of alien monsters. Discover the great mystery and get to know the truth about our space marine.

Creators:
Michał Kłoś - programming
Andrzej Koloska - sensei; programming, level design
Iwo Bujkiewicz - audio engineering
Maciej Dudziak - lvl.2 graphics design
Szymon Dmitruk - lvl.1 graphics design, animation

all assests were created by us

Created with the help of:
Marcin Kozieł - voice actor
yadronoff, Quaker540, tvlaudio @ freesound.org

Music:
Dawid W. Mika - Psyhippie
